Translations.Text: Anakhi kititari phariste akasammadhye aheta, jyanci sipharasa kahica upayogi padu sakata nahi, matra hi gosta vegali ki allaha apalya icchene va apalya khusine jyala icchila ajna (anumati) de'ila
Nihsansaya, je loka akhiratavara imana rakhata nahi, te pharistyanna strirupi devatanci nave detata
Vastavika tyanna yace kahica jnana nahi. Te kevala apalya bhramacya mage lagale aheta ani nihsansaya, bhrama (ani anumana) satyasamora kahica upayogi padata nahi
Tevha tumhi tyacyakaduna tonda phiravuna ghya, jo amacya smaranampasuna tonda phiravila ani jyanca uddesa kevala aihika jivanakherija kahi nasava
Hica tyancya jnanaci sima ahe. Tumaca palanakarta tyala cangalya prakare janato, jo tyacya margapasuna vicalita jhala ahe ani toca cangalya prakare janato tyala dekhila, jo sanmargavara ahe

Ani allahaceca ahe, je kahi akasammadhye ahe ani je kahi dharatita ahe, yasathi ki tyane (allahane) duskarma karanaryanna tyancya karmanca mobadala dyava ani satkarma karanarya lokanna cangala mobadala dyava

Je loka mothamothe aparadha ani ughada nirlajjatecya krtyampasuna dura rahatata, yakherija ki kahi lahana sahana aparadha tyancyakaduna ghadatata, nihsansaya, (asa lokansathi) tumacya palanakartyaci ksamasilata ati visala ahe. To tumhala cangalya prakare janato, jevha tyane tumhala jaminituna nirmana kele ani jevha tumhi apalya matancya garbhata mula (arbhaka) hote tevha tumhi apale pavitrya svatah sangu naka. Toca neka - sadacari lokanna cangalya prakare janato
Kaya tumhi tyala pahile, jyane tonda phiravuna ghetale
Ani phara kami dile ani hata rokhala
Kaya tyala paroksa jnana ahe ki to (sarva kahi) pahata ahe
Kaya tyala tya gostici khabara nahi dili geli, ji musa (alai.) Cya granthata hoti
Ani ekanistha ibrahima (alai.) Cya granthata hoti
Ki konatahi manusya dusarya konacehi ojhe ucalanara nahi
Ani he ki pratyeka manasakarita kevala teca ahe, jyaca tyane svatah prayatna kela
Ani he ki nihsansaya, tyaca prayatna lavakaraca pahila ja'ila
Maga tyala purepura mobadala dila ja'ila
Ani he ki tumacya palanakartya (allaha) kadeca pohacayace ahe
Ani he ki toca hasavito ani toca radavito
Ani he ki toca marato ani toca jivanta karato
Ani he ki tyaneca joda arthata nara - madi nirmana kela
Viryapasuna jevha to tapakavila jato
Ani he ki dusaryanda jivanta karane tyacica jababadari ahe
Ani he ki toca dhanavana banavito ani dhana deto
Ani he ki toca se'ara (tarya) ca svami va palanakarta ahe
Ani he ki tyaneca pahilya adala nasta kele ahe
Ani samudala dekhila, (jyapaiki) ekalahi sillaka thevale nahi
Ani tyacyapurvi nuhacya janasamuhala. Nihsansaya, te mothe atyacari ani udhdata loka hote
Ani ‘mutaphika’ (sahara kinva palathya padalelya vastyanna) tyaneca palathe ghatale
Maga tyancyavara acchadita kele, je kahi acchadita kele
Tevha he manava! Tu apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya krpa denagi (nemata) baddala vada karasila
He (paigambara) khabaradara karanare aheta, purvi ho'una gelelya khabaradara karanaryampaiki
Yenari vela (ghatika) javala ye'una thepali ahe
Allahasivaya tila jahira karanara an'ya koni nahi
Tevha kaya tumhi ya gostivara ascarya karata
Ani hasata ahata, radata nahi
(Kimbahuna) tumhi khelata ahata
Ata allahasamora sajade kara (matha teka) ani (tyacica) upasana kara
Kayamata javala ali ani candra dubhangala
He jevha ekhada mojija (camatkara) pahatata, tevha tonda phiravitata, ani mhanatata hi tara pahilyapasuna calata aleli jadu ahe
Ani tyanni khote tharavile va apalya iccha akanksance anusarana kele. Ani pratyeka karya niscita velevaraca nirdharita ahe
Nihsansaya, tyacyajavala tya varta ye'una pohacalya aheta, jyata tambi - takidi (ci sikavana) aheta
Ani purna bud'dhikausalyaci gosta ahe, parantu ya bhayabhita karanarya gostinnihi kahi labha dila nahi
(Tevha, he paigambara!) Tumhi tyancyakaduna tonda phirava, jya divasi eka pukaranara apriya gostikade bolavila
He jhukalelya netranni kabarimadhuna asa prakare uthuna ubhe rahatila ki janu itastatah pasaralela tola thava
Pukaranaryakade dhavata jata asatila ani kaphira mhanatila ki ha divasa tara motha kathina ahe
